original_title: The Man from the Rio Grande
overview: The suspicious death of Henry King during a hunting trip with his brother John leaves the inheritance of the rich Santa Rita Ranch to be shared with John, Henry's daughter Doris and a young girl from New York, Twinkle Watts. King says that a son, Henry King Jr., who left home as a young boy was killed in a Texas gunfight.  - Written by Les Adams
tagline: He's a straight-shootin, hard-riding man from the Rio Grande, battling his way to bring justice to the lawless West!
title: The Man from the Rio Grande
